name: Sangria
author: Poltergasm
description:
Originally
 started out as a 1bit palette, but a pink was added to create shadows, 
or in a video game, to denote decorations you can't interact with. The 
red reminded me of the sangria my ex used to make. If she's reading 
this, I miss you. Even though it's been 10 years, you're still in 
thoughts every single day. I think I may have left my Assassin's Creed 
trilogy box set at your place. When can I pick it up? Sundays are best 
for me, but let me know and we'll work something out.
